name: Android Helipad (itch)
description:
Mibongo Software is a solo independent video game studio. Android Helipad is my first game and it was a great project to do while learning all the different tools and methods of game development. Development on Android Helipad began November 2018 and I made an effort to use the most inexpensive tools while still being time efficient. I'm always eager for feedback and can be reached using the comments below or by email at mibongodev@gmail[dot]com. For more development news you can follow me on twitter at @MibongoD and follow my development journal on https://mibongo.wordpress.com/.

Minimum Requirements:
  • Operating System: Windows 7 SP1+, macOS 10.12+, Ubuntu 16.04+
  • 64-bit OS required
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.3 GHz, Intel Xeon, Intel Pentium M, AMD Phenom, AMD Athelon 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 485 MB (Windows), 488 MB (Linux), 536 MB (Mac)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8400 GS, ATI HD 3400
  • Direct X: Version 10 (Windows)
Recommended Specs:
  • Operating System: Windows 7 SP1+, macOS 10.12+, Ubuntu 16.04+
  • 64-bit OS required
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400 3.1GHz, AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 485 MB (Windows), 488 MB (Linux), 536 MB (Mac)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, ATI R9 390
  • Direct X: Version 11 (Windows)
